feature.label: Pureclipse plugin for PureMVC
feature.description: With the Pureclipse you will absolutely increase your development speed because of it's powerfull but still simple templates. It is not just a template system, it is shaped for PureMVC and Fabrication. Features: building PureMVC/Fabrication templates for Commands, Proxies and Mediators.
